languages.text: "Обычных людей плен травмирует, истинно верующих — закаляет. А подобных тебе, культистка, делает только опаснее и безумней".

traits.locale_text: "Обычных людей плен травмирует, истинно верующих — закаляет. А подобных тебе, культистка, делает только опаснее и безумней".

languages.text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
languages.original_text: "Обычных людей плен травмирует, истинно верующих — закаляет. А подобных тебе, культистка, делает только опаснее и безумней".

traits.locale_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
"Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
"Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
"Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
"Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
"Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

languages.text: 「囚われの身は、凡人を傷つけ、真に信仰深い者をさらに強くする。そしてお前のような連中―カルト信者は、ただ狂気と危険を増すだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

traits.locale_text: 「囚われの身は、凡人を傷つけ、真に信仰深い者をさらに強くする。そしてお前のような連中―カルト信者は、ただ狂気と危険を増すだけだ」

languages.text: "Die Gefangenschaft traumatisiert gewöhnliche Leute und stärkt die wahrlich Frommen. Was Leute wie Euch angeht, Kultistin ... Euch macht sie nur noch gefährlicher und wahnsinniger."
languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gefangenschaft traumatisiert gewöhnliche Leute und stärkt die wahrlich Frommen. Was Leute wie Euch angeht, Kultistin ... Euch macht sie nur noch gefährlicher und wahnsinniger."

languages.text: « La captivité traumatise les gens ordinaires et renforce les pieux. Quant aux individus de votre acabit, cultiste, elle ne fait que les rendre plus dangereux et plus dérangés. »
languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

traits.locale_text: « La captivité traumatise les gens ordinaires et renforce les pieux. Quant aux individus de votre acabit, cultiste, elle ne fait que les rendre plus dangereux et plus dérangés. »

languages.text: «El cautiverio traumatiza a las personas ordinarias y fortalece a los devotos. Pero a la gente como usted, sectaria, la vuelve más peligrosa y demente».
languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

traits.locale_text: «El cautiverio traumatiza a las personas ordinarias y fortalece a los devotos. Pero a la gente como usted, sectaria, la vuelve más peligrosa y demente».

languages.text: “囚禁会给普通人带来创伤，但却会让真正虔诚的人更加坚强。至于像你这样的邪教徒，这只会让你更危险、更疯狂。”
languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

traits.locale_text: “囚禁会给普通人带来创伤，但却会让真正虔诚的人更加坚强。至于像你这样的邪教徒，这只会让你更危险、更疯狂。”

languages.text: "Esaret, sıradan insanların ruhlarını bozar ama yürekten inananlara güç verir. Senin gibi tarikatçılarsa esaret altında bilenir, yoldan çıkar."
languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."

traits.locale_text: "Esaret, sıradan insanların ruhlarını bozar ama yürekten inananlara güç verir. Senin gibi tarikatçılarsa esaret altında bilenir, yoldan çıkar."

languages.original_text: "Captivity traumatises ordinary people and strengthens the truly devout. As for people like you, cultist — it only makes you more dangerous and deranged."
